<div class="Carousel md:w-full lg:w-2/5 xl:w-3/5 mx-auto hidden-phone flickity-enabled is-draggable" data-flickity="{
    "pageDots": false,

    "dragThreshold": 10,
    "prevNextButtons": false,

  }" tabindex="0">
